= Motion in a Plane =

== Components of Velocity and Acceleration ==

Speed

Magnitude

{{$
v = \sqrt{v_x^2 + v_y^2}
}}$

Components

{{$
v_x = v \mathrm{cos}\theta
}}$

{{$
v_y = v \mathrm{sin}\theta
}}$

== Motion with Constant Acceleration ==

== The Motion of Projectiles ==

Horizontal Motion

{{$
v_x = v_{0x}
}}$

{{$
x = v_{0x}t
}}$

Vertical Motion

{{$
v_y = v_{0y} - gt
}}$

{{$
y = v_{0y}t - \frac{1}{2}gt^2
}}$

== Vectors ==

== Vector Addition and Subtraction ==

== The Position, Velocity, and Acceleration Vectors ==

== Uniform Circular Motion ==

Angular Velocity

{{$
\omega = \frac{v}{r}
}}$

{{$
\omega = \frac{\theta}{t}
}}$

{{$
\omega = \frac{2\pi}{T}
}}$

Centripetal acceleration

{{$
a = \frac{v^2}{r}
}}$

{{$
a = \frac{(\omega r)^2}{r} = \omega^2 r
}}$
